TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Lasutan, title = Lasutan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lasutan} }

S.FORM: Lasutan Itiniay i Hualien Cen no Hualien ko Lasutan a niyaro', 1,940 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 4,942 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 13% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 633 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 87% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4,309 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 9%, Tayal 1%, Truku 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Lasotan Itiniay i Hoalien Cen no Hoalien ko Lasotan a niyaro', 1,940 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 4,942 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 13% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 633 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 87% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4,309 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 9%, Tayal 1%, Troko 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
